intro: Dichroa yaoshanensis, commonly known as the Yaoshan dichroa, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae and is characterized by its striking, palmate leaves that are often brightly colored. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically greenish-white in color. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
